title: Would a Rioter be available for my 1000th normal win?
body:
Been sitting at 999 for a couple of days and just realized it (thankfully, I've been playing ARAMs). Would a Riot employee be so generous as to group with me to get that 1000th win?

From a longtime player, thanks for all you've done with this game.

replies.body:
> Riot KateyKhaos
 >Let's do this!
>Ivellius

This isn't my thread or my business really !  But I just gotta say something :)  I can't tell you how great I think this is. How often this happens and how kool and great for player that You KateyKhaos and the other Rioter who do this. 

Thanks for taking your personal time :)  

OP hope you won and had Fun !
It was fun. We started to snowball at about 20 minutes and won pretty handily (they surrendered).

That was fast.

(Both the response and the game.)

Thanks for the group!

> It was fun. We started to snowball at about 20 minutes and won pretty handily (they surrendered).

Hey glad to hear it :)
